backend/main.mo: Defines the core backend actor with user profiles, tasks, rewards, quest caching, system settings, and admin authorization state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, app providers, authentication-aware routing, and main page flow.
frontend/src/components/adults/TaskEdito: Dialog UI for creating a new adult task with inputs for title, description, points, and type.
frontend/src/components/adults/TaskTable: Displays a table of adult tasks with status badges and basic task metadata.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity actions, loading states, and mode‑aware styling.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppLogo: Renders the ChoreQuest logo with size‑based styling using an image and gradient text.
frontend/src/components/kids/Leaderboard: Displays a leaderboard card showing the top 10 users with rank icons, highlighting the current user.
frontend/src/components/kids/QuestCard.t: Shows a task card with progress, status indicators, and buttons to accept or complete quests.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, theming, and footer, adapting to kids or adult mode.
frontend/src/components/parent/RewardCat: Manages the reward catalog, listing rewards and providing a dialog to create new ones.
frontend/src/components/parent/TaskManag: Displays all tasks with a table and opens a dialog to create new tasks.
frontend/src/components/parent/ThemeMana: Shows available world themes with preview images and theme descriptions.
frontend/src/components/store/RewardCard: Renders a reward card that users can redeem if they have enough points, with kids‑mode styling options.
frontend/src/context/ModeContext.tsx: Provides context for switching and persisting the UI mode between kids and adults.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Includes utilities to create an AuthClient with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, tasks, rewards, and related backend data via an actor. Includes success/error handling and automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global styles. Adds utility classes and base styling overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App. Imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/adults/AdultsDashboar: Adult dashboard showing task metrics, task list, and a dialog to create new tasks. Fetches tasks and user profile and displays loading states.
frontend/src/pages/kids/KidsDashboardPag: Kids dashboard showing active, available, and completed quests, as well as a leaderboard. Filters tasks by status and displays themed quest cards.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/AgeSelecti: Onboarding step letting users select an age bracket and proceed. Updates selected age and triggers callbacks for navigation and selection.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/AvatarCrea: Renders avatar choices with emoji buttons and stores the selected avatar before allowing the user to continue.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/FirstQuest: Shows a tutorial quest intro and completion flow, updating state when the user accepts and finishes the quest.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Controls the multi‑step onboarding process, storing user input and submitting the profile when complete.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/ProfileSte: Collects the user's display name and proceeds when a valid name is entered.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/RewardSyst: Lets the user choose a preferred reward system and continues once one is selected.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/ThemeSelec: Loads available world themes and allows the user to select one before advancing.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/WelcomeSte: Displays the initial welcome screen inviting the user to start onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/parent/ParentDashboar: Checks admin status and, if allowed, shows tabs for managing tasks, rewards, and themes; otherwise offers admin setup.
frontend/src/pages/settings/SettingsPage: Provides UI to switch between kids and adults interface modes using toggles.
frontend/src/pages/store/RewardsStorePag: Page component that loads user profile and available rewards, shows points balance, and renders redeemable RewardCard items with kids-mode styling.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Landing page presenting the app's core features, themed visuals, and a login button. Adapts typography based on kids/adults mode.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the ChoreQuest app vision, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features metadata.
